parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name to be assigned to the workflow. It should be unique within your account.

parameters.name: DefaultRunProperties
parameters.description: A collection of properties to be used as part of each execution of the workflow. Run properties may be logged. Do not pass plaintext secrets as properties. Retrieve secrets from a Glue Connection, Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager or other secret management mechanism if you intend to use them within the workflow run. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be used with this workflow. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow which was provided as part of the request.
